artist: Artist: Hugh Thomson; Author: Charles Dickens; Publisher: The Limited Editions Club; Printer: Moira and  Robert Gibbings , (text); Printer: Oxford University Press, Oxford, England , (prints)

title: The Cricket on the Hearth
